fields.description:
{html}

iPad 3.2.2 - Mobile sdk build 1.5.0.8846d87

1.install and launch KS (iphone idiom)
2.change tabs, then close the app and check output

Tue Nov 2 11:39:19 Jeff-Haynies-iPad KitchenSink[18167] : *** _NSAutoreleaseNoPool(): Object 0x4dd6a0 of class NSCFArray autoreleased with no pool in place - just leaking
Stack: (0x30363e5b 0x30335d49 0x30335d1b 0x314dd819 0x599d5 0x23e3d 0x23189 0x314deffb 0x26b81 0x30343bd1 0x303afcff 0x33b6678d 0x33b5c078)

{html}
fields.summary: iOS, iPad: iPhone idiom - _NSAutoreleaseNoPool() leak warning on app shutdown

comments.body:
{html}

Unable to reproduce on any device which does not support backgrounding (iOS 4.1 with opt-out, 3.1.2). Probably fixed by #2241. Marking fixed-in-qa.

{html}
